passives.name: Sweet Spot
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{pp|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage and abilities deal {{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage. The distance is calculated from your {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} current position to the target's position at the time the triggering attack or ability hits them.
